org.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users WHERE LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%john smi%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%john smi%')) OR (LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%john%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%john%')) AND (LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%')) ORDER BY users.id ASC LIMIT "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users WHERE LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%john smi%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%john smi%') LIMIT 1) OR (LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%john%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%john%')) AND (LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%')) ORDER BY users.id ASC LIMIT "$1"
